value.text: Chef-made food catering ready for quick delivery at your door steps
YOU ORDER. WE COOK & DELIVER
Use the phone, website or mobile app to order on-demand food or schedule delivery up to a week in advance.
EATING FRESH
Gourmet Food Catering
Our chefs come from top restaurant kitchens. They bring mad skills, tons of passion, and expertise in a delicious array of cuisines. They insist on using only the freshest seasonal ingredients.
Get a chance to meet our chefs

Our chefs come from top restaurant kitchens. They bring mad skills, tons of passion, and expertise in a delicious array of cuisines. They insist, as we do, on using only the freshest seasonal ingredients.

Chef MIKE HARRIS

 

Chef OKUNI NAKATO

 

Chef  MARY SEYMOUR

Specialises in grill & salads

 

Expert in sushi, fish & raw food

 

Bakery & pastry grandmaster
Meals arrive chilled so everything stays fresh. Simple directions tell you the final step, which is usually a few minutes in your oven.
Each week's menu is based on your requests and, of-course, on our chefs' inspiration.

Peas Cream Soup

Chicken Country

Strawberry Tart

Egg Drop Soup

Fruit Salad

Lemon Muffins
Only the freshest meat & healthiest ingredients are keys of our success!
Food made with love & passion

Visit our website or use our app to order. Choose from main dishes, sides, salads, desserts and drinks. Healthy and tempting kids’ meals, too. There’s always something new to try. Lorem ipsum.

Our chefs create dishes they love. They slice and dice, chop and mix, sauté and roast in our local kitchens, cooking up thoughtful, tempting dishes. Each chef has their own style, with tons of variety. Lorem ipsum.
